memberdef.argsstring: (TextEditorModel model)
memberdef.name: RegisterCustom

briefdescription.para: It is recommended to use the RegisterTemplated method as it will internally reference the ITextEditorLexer and IDecorationMapper that correspond to the desired text editor.

memberdef.argsstring: (string extensionNoPeriod, ResourceUri resourceUri, DateTime resourceLastWriteTime, string initialContent, string? overrideDisplayTextForFileExtension=null)
memberdef.name: RegisterTemplated

briefdescription.para:
Plain Text Editor: one would pass in an extensionNoPeriod of "txt" or the constant varible: ExtensionNoPeriodFacts.TXT.
.

detaileddescription.para: C# Text Editor: one would pass in an extensionNoPeriod of "cs" or the constant varible: ExtensionNoPeriodFacts.C_SHARP_CLASS; NOTE: One must first install the Luthetus.CompilerServices.CSharp NuGet package.

One should store the result of invoking this method in a variable, then reference that variable. If one continually invokes this, there is no guarantee that the data had not changed since the previous invocation.

memberdef.name: InsertText

memberdef.argsstring: (ITextEditorEditContext editContext, TextEditorModelModifier modelModifier, CursorModifierBagTextEditor cursorModifierBag, string content, CancellationToken cancellationToken)
memberdef.name: InsertTextUnsafe

briefdescription.para:
If one wants to guarantee that the state is up to date use InsertTextFactory instead of this method. This is because, the ITextEditorService will provide you the latest instance of the given TextEditorCursor. As opposed to whatever instance of the TextEditorCursorModifier you have at time of enqueueing.
This method is needed however, because if one wants to arbitrarily create a cursor that does not map to the view model's cursors, then one would use this method. Since an attempt to map the cursor key would come back as the cursor not existing.

memberdef.argsstring: (ITextEditorEditContext editContext, TextEditorModelModifier modelModifier, CursorModifierBagTextEditor cursorModifierBag, KeymapArgs keymapArgs, CancellationToken cancellationToken)
